SELECT A.BNO AS BNO , A.TITLE AS TITLE , A.ID AS ID , UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(A.REG_DATE) AS GAP , CASE WHEN (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(A.REG_DATE)) < 0 THEN DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%H:%i') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%Y.%m.%d.') END AS REG_DATE
, A.CNT AS CNT , C.CNT AS GOOD , B.CNT AS REPLYCNT , A.KIND , D.MENU_NM , A.TYPE FROM BOARD A JOIN (SELECT A.BNO AS BNO , COUNT(B.RNO) AS CNT FROM BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.* FROM REPLY A WHERE DEL_YN = 'N') B ON A.BNO = B.BNO WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY A.BNO) B ON A.BNO = B.BNO JOIN (SELECT A.BNO AS BNO , COUNT(B.ID) AS CNT FROM BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN GOOD B ON A.BNO = B.BNO WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY A.BNO) C ON A.BNO = C.BNO JOIN MENU D ON A.KIND = D.MENU_ID WHERE 1=1 AND DEL = 'N'
AND KIND = #{kind} AND TYPE = 'N'
AND (CASE WHEN A.KIND = 'BN' THEN A.TYPE = 'N' ELSE A.TYPE IN ('Y', 'N') END)
ORDER BY GOOD DESC, BNO DESC
ORDER BY A.BNO DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{userDisplay}
